Html:
Hi, thz again to have create a great graph tools. 

Here is my question, is there any reasons why the implementation of different shortest path algorith are in sealed class. It reduce the option of inherith from these class. In my case, i  just need to add some functionality to these algorith. Sealed class mean i need to rewrite the whole class with my added content. Or to modify the source code (what i don't wanna do since i want to support update of quickgraph).

have a nice day
Why do you want to inherit from those classes? Shortest Path algorithms expose events that you can hook to without inheritance. Just wondering.
hello, i need to modify some method and add some constructor to them, have a nice day
that's what I don't understand. Which method/contructors are you missing?
